name: broversion
description: List of current browser versions from Caniuse api

scripts.start: cross-env NO_COLOR=1 BROWSERSLIST_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=production node app
scripts.dev: cross-env NO_COLOR=1 BROWSERSLIST_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=dev node app

author: Sergey Kozlov <geminic@yandex.ru>
